verses.verse: Now these are the words<WH1697> of the letter<WH5612> that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> sent<WH7971> from Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the residue<WH3499> of the elders<WH2205> which were carried away captives<WH1473>, and to the priests<WH3548>, and to the prophets<WH5030>, and to all the people<WH5971> whom Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had carried away captive<WH1540> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon<WH894>;

(After<WH310> that Jeconiah<WH3204> the king<WH4428>, and the queen<WH1377>, and the eunuchs<WH5631>, the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389>, and the carpenters<WH2796>, and the smiths<WH4525>, were departed<WH3318> from Jerusalem<WH3389>;) eunuchs: or, chamberlains

By the hand<WH3027> of Elasah<WH501> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227>, and Gemariah<WH1587> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah<WH2518>, (whom Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> sent<WH7971> unto Babylon<WH894> to Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>) saying<WH559>,

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, unto all that are carried away captives<WH1473>, whom I have caused to be carried away<WH1540> from Jerusalem<WH3389> unto Babylon<WH894>;
Build<WH1129> ye houses<WH1004>, and dwell<WH3427> in them; and plant<WH5193> gardens<WH1593>, and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them;

Take<WH3947> ye wives<WH802>, and beget<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>; and take<WH3947> wives<WH802> for your sons<WH1121>, and give<WH5414> your daughters<WH1323> to husbands<WH582>, that they may bear<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1121>; that ye may be increased<WH7235> there, and not diminished<WH4591>.

And seek<WH1875> the peace<WH7965> of the city<WH5892> whither I have caused you to be carried away captives<WH1540>, and pray<WH6419> unto the LORD<WH3068> for it: for in the peace<WH7965> thereof shall ye have peace<WH7965>.

For thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Let not your prophets<WH5030> and your diviners<WH7080>, that be in the midst<WH7130> of you, deceive<WH5377> you, neither hearken<WH8085> to your dreams<WH2472> which ye cause to be dreamed<WH2492>.
For they prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267> unto you in my name<WH8034>: I have not sent<WH7971> them, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>. falsely: Heb. in a lie

For thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>, That after<WH6310> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141> be accomplished<WH4390> at Babylon<WH894> I will visit<WH6485> you, and perform<WH6965> my good<WH2896> word<WH1697> toward you, in causing you to return<WH7725> to this place<WH4725>.

For I know<WH3045> the thoughts<WH4284> that I think<WH2803> toward you, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, thoughts<WH4284> of peace<WH7965>, and not of evil<WH7451>, to give<WH5414> you an expected<WH8615> end<WH319>. expected: Heb. end and expectation
Then shall ye call<WH7121> upon me, and ye shall go<WH1980> and pray<WH6419> unto me, and I will hearken<WH8085> unto you.
And ye shall seek<WH1245> me, and find<WH4672> me, when ye shall search<WH1875> for me with all your heart<WH3824>.

And I will be found<WH4672> of you, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>: and I will turn away<WH7725> your captivity<WH7622> <WH7622>, and I will gather<WH6908> you from all the nations<WH1471>, and from all the places<WH4725> whither I have driven<WH5080> you, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>; and I will bring you again<WH7725> into the place<WH4725> whence I caused you to be carried away captive<WH1540>.
Because ye have said<WH559>, The LORD<WH3068> hath raised us up<WH6965> prophets<WH5030> in Babylon<WH894>;

Know that thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of the king<WH4428> that sitteth<WH3427> upon the throne<WH3678> of David<WH1732>, and of all the people<WH5971> that dwelleth<WH3427> in this city<WH5892>, and of your brethren<WH251> that are not gone forth<WH3318> with you into captivity<WH1473>;

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Behold, I will send<WH7971> upon them the sword<WH2719>, the famine<WH7458>, and the pestilence<WH1698>, and will make<WH5414> them like vile<WH8182> figs<WH8384>, that cannot be eaten<WH398>, they are so evil<WH7455>.

And I will persecute<WH7291> them<WH310> with the sword<WH2719>, with the famine<WH7458>, and with the pestilence<WH1698>, and will deliver<WH5414> them to be removed<WH2189> <WH2113> to all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776>, to be a curse<WH423>, and an astonishment<WH8047>, and an hissing<WH8322>, and a reproach<WH2781>, among all the nations<WH1471> whither I have driven<WH5080> them: to be a curse: Heb. for a curse

Because they have not hearkened<WH8085> to my words<WH1697>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, which I sent<WH7971> unto them by my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them; but ye would not hear<WH8085>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.
Hear<WH8085> ye therefore the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>, all ye of the captivity<WH1473>, whom I have sent<WH7971> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon<WH894>:

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, of Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Kolaiah<WH6964>, and of Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641>, which prophesy<WH5012> a lie<WH8267> unto you in my name<WH8034>; Behold, I will deliver<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>; and he shall slay<WH5221> them before your eyes<WH5869>;

And of them shall be taken up<WH3947> a curse<WH7045> by all the captivity<WH1546> of Judah<WH3063> which are in Babylon<WH894>, saying<WH559>, The LORD<WH3068> make<WH7760> thee like Zedekiah<WH6667> and like Ahab<WH256>, whom the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> roasted<WH7033> in the fire<WH784>;

Because they have committed<WH6213> villany<WH5039> in Israel<WH3478>, and have committed<WH6213> adultery<WH5003> with their neighbours'<WH7453> wives<WH802>, and have spoken<WH1696> lying<WH8267> words<WH1697> in my name<WH8034>, which I have not commanded<WH6680> them; even I know<WH3045>, and am a witness<WH5707>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.
Thus shalt thou also speak<WH559> to Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161>, saying<WH559>, Nehelamite: or, dreamer

Thus speaketh<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Because thou hast sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> in thy name<WH8034> unto all the people<WH5971> that are at Jerusalem<WH3389>, and to Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the priest<WH3548>, and to all the priests<WH3548>, saying<WH559>,

The LORD<WH3068> hath made<WH5414> thee priest<WH3548> in the stead of Jehoiada<WH3077> the priest<WH3548>, that ye should be officers<WH6496> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, for every man<WH376> that is mad<WH7696>, and maketh himself a prophet<WH5012>, that thou shouldest put<WH5414> him in prison<WH4115>, and in the stocks<WH6729>.
Now therefore why hast thou not reproved<WH1605> Jeremiah<WH3414> of Anathoth<WH6069>, which maketh himself a prophet<WH5012> to you?

For therefore he sent<WH7971> unto us in Babylon<WH894>, saying<WH559>, This<WH1931> captivity is long<WH752>: build<WH1129> ye houses<WH1004>, and dwell<WH3427> in them; and plant<WH5193> gardens<WH1593>, and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them.
And Zephaniah<WH6846> the priest<WH3548> read<WH7121> this letter<WH5612> in the ears<WH241> of Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Send<WH7971> to all them of the captivity<WH1473>, saying<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> concerning Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161>; Because that Shemaiah<WH8098> hath prophesied<WH5012> unto you, and I sent<WH7971> him not, and he caused you to trust<WH982> in a lie<WH8267>:

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; Behold, I will punish<WH6485> Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161>, and his seed<WH2233>: he shall not have a man<WH376> to dwell<WH3427> among<WH8432> this people<WH5971>; neither shall he behold<WH7200> the good<WH2896> that I will do<WH6213> for my people<WH5971>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>; because he hath taught<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against the LORD<WH3068>. rebellion: Heb. revolt
